hero.title: Rats currently looking for homes
hero.subtitle: We only list rats that are ready or nearly ready to leave. Some may be held longer for evaluation.

sections.title: Available and reserved rats
sections.subtitle: Details such as temperament and background can be discussed further by message.

body.text: We prefer to place rats in pairs or compatible groups unless there is a strong reason otherwise. Single rats are only placed into existing groups or under special circumstances.

items: Please be prepared to share information about your housing, diet and previous experience.
It is okay if you are new, as long as you are willing to learn.
We reserve the right to decline placements that we feel are not a good fit.
